Name: Conference event
Description: A particular instance of a recurring conference, like Linuxfest'09Â or '5th Annual meeting of the Peru Veterinary Association'. May be used independently if there is only one meeting. A conference is an event whose primary focus is verbal presentation or discussion. Speaker information is handled by /event/public_speaking_event

Properties.Name: Focus
Properties.Description: Specific topic or subject, especially for conferences with a new specific focus each year

Properties.Name: Part of conference series
Properties.Description: If this conference is part of a recurring series of conferences, enter the series name here. For example, TED 2008 is part of the TED series of conferences.

Properties.Name: Venue
Properties.Description: The venue in which this conference was held.

Properties.Name: Sponsoring organization
Properties.Description: The organization (company, group, agency, etc.) that sponsors or puts on the conference or convention.
